entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING ENDED, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:01 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
